name: Resonate
description: Python-based plugin for executing ReSonAte analysis

configStructure.name: analysis_execution_name
configStructure.description: Optional name for this analysis execution

configStructure.name: execution_path
configStructure.description: Location where file recorded after simulation is stored

configStructure.name: execute_recent
configStructure.description: Runs analysis on the latest ran experiment. If set to false runs analysis on all simulation data from previous experiments
